data.title: Square One TV/Episode 440
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Episode 440 is the fortieth episode of the fourth season of Square One TV, and the one-hundred ninety-fifth episode overall.

Starring:

Guest Starring: James DePaiva (Archie Leach), Chuck McCann (Sheriff Mooney Rooney), Jayne Meadows (Lady Astute)

Co-Starring:

Contents

1 Segments

2 Credits

3 Notes

4 Trivia

4.1 The Show

4.2 Allusions and References

5 Quotes

Segments

If It's Our There: Shopper (EKA #402)

Watermelons cost $1.00 each, so with 75 cents a customer gets 3/4 of a watermelon. The remaining 1/4 watermelon goes to a young girl who gives a quarter to the resourceful cashier.

Piece of the Pie

2 teams guess top answers to the survey question "Name something to take camping." Team earning greater percentage guesses top answer to: thing in a pocketbook, food at park, zoo animal.

If It's Out There: Chef (EKA #410)

A home cook follows the instructions of a TV chef, but uses a tablespoon of baking powder instead of a teaspoon, so his popover comes out unusually large.

Mathnet: The Despair in Monterey Bay - Part 5 (EKA #410)

Pat & George hypothesize that Archie drifted seaward with the boat before the diamond dropped, but this means that it fell into very deep water. They send a remotely operated vehicle down to search.
